title: Rollercoaster Tycoon (by Atari Interactive)
author: ste86uk
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/rollercoaster-tycoon-netflix/id6451004655 RollerCoaster Tycoon NETFLIX NETFLIX MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED. Design, build and manage your own thrill-packed theme park in this fully reimagined mobile… DetailsNETFLIX MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED. Design, build and manage your own thrill-packed theme park in this fully reimagined mobile version of the classic simulation game. Let's ride! Experience "RollerCoaster Tycoon" in a whole new way on mobile. This exclusive Netflix edition of the 3D park-building sim is packed with more options, challenges and thrills than ever. This is a deep simulation game where you create a theme park and manage it all: roller coasters, rides, shops, restaurants, bathrooms, janitors, decorations and more. You're the tycoon, the park is your sandbox, and every detail — from prices to paint colors — is up to you. EXCLUSIVES FOR NETFLIX MEMBERS Give your park Netflix-themed flair with new attractions included in this edition of "RollerCoaster Tycoon Touch," from the high-adrenaline Netflix & Thrills ride to a special swag shop. BECOME A TOP TYCOON Carefully manage, maintain and upgrade your park to keep visitors happy and attendance growing. As your park expands, you'll earn rewards and card packs that let you build hundreds of rides, restaurants and more. You can even open a water park full of aquatic attractions and wild slides. DESIGN THE ULTIMATE ROLLER COASTER Use the roller coaster builder to construct intense rides full of loops, rolls, twists, corkscrews, dips, dives and more. Get creative and push the limits of coaster design. NEW OPPORTUNITIES EVERY DAY Idle-style gameplay means your park will keep running while you're busy, but make sure to check in daily and complete limited-time missions to earn rewards. Special seasonal events can help you design the Wild West, sci-fi or adventure-themed park of your dreams. BUILD A WHOLE WORLD ON MOBILE This park builder simulation game is designed for smooth, intuitive play on your phone or tablet. Tap buildings to see details, drag to rearrange, and use your fingers to effortlessly adjust your 3D bird's-eye view of the park. - Created by Atari and Nvizzio Creations. Genre:Simulation, Strategy TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal Is this just the Netflix version of touch without the iap? Yup. Looks like it. This game had so many IAPs and so much progression/leveling system. Ruined it for me. @Rocksaint yes I just tried it for 10 min while I could grab a few min. Definitely think it’s the iap filled touch one, but I think I’ll give it a go now since it’s Netflix and won’t have all the iap. Still has idle earning for gold though so it’ll still be one you come and go from rather than play for hours on end I imagine. Problem is not being free of all IAPs. Problem for these games is that they are designed to be F2P. And Netflix doesn’t fix that. So it just feels like a F2P game pulled into a sub model. That’s it. But yeah, no harm in giving it a go if you’ve already got Netflix. The screenshots make it look so pretty with the images on the AppStore but I think it looks pretty ugly and dated, worse than even the original games looked for my taste anyway. The only aesthetic in the series I have any love for is the first one. When I saw this thread's title, I thought it was a subscription version of that one and thought it was a shame I wouldn't play it for that reason. When I saw the art style, I was relieved. (⁠ ⁠ꈍ⁠ᴗ⁠ꈍ⁠) Share This Page
html:
1. https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/rollercoaster-tycoon-netflix/id6451004655

    RollerCoaster Tycoon NETFLIX

    NETFLIX MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED. Design, build and manage your own thrill-packed theme park in this fully reimagined mobile…
    Details
    NETFLIX MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED. Design, build and manage your own thrill-packed theme park in this fully reimagined mobile version of the classic simulation game. Let's ride! Experience "RollerCoaster Tycoon" in a whole new way on mobile. This exclusive Netflix edition of the 3D park-building sim is packed with more options, challenges and thrills than ever. This is a deep simulation game where you create a theme park and manage it all: roller coasters, rides, shops, restaurants, bathrooms, janitors, decorations and more. You're the tycoon, the park is your sandbox, and every detail — from prices to paint colors — is up to you. EXCLUSIVES FOR NETFLIX MEMBERS Give your park Netflix-themed flair with new attractions included in this edition of "RollerCoaster Tycoon Touch," from the high-adrenaline Netflix & Thrills ride to a special swag shop. BECOME A TOP TYCOON Carefully manage, maintain and upgrade your park to keep visitors happy and attendance growing. As your park expands, you'll earn rewards and card packs that let you build hundreds of rides, restaurants and more. You can even open a water park full of aquatic attractions and wild slides. DESIGN THE ULTIMATE ROLLER COASTER Use the roller coaster builder to construct intense rides full of loops, rolls, twists, corkscrews, dips, dives and more. Get creative and push the limits of coaster design. NEW OPPORTUNITIES EVERY DAY Idle-style gameplay means your park will keep running while you're busy, but make sure to check in daily and complete limited-time missions to earn rewards. Special seasonal events can help you design the Wild West, sci-fi or adventure-themed park of your dreams. BUILD A WHOLE WORLD ON MOBILE This park builder simulation game is designed for smooth, intuitive play on your phone or tablet. Tap buildings to see details, drag to rearrange, and use your fingers to effortlessly adjust your 3D bird's-eye view of the park. - Created by Atari and Nvizzio Creations.
    Genre:Simulation, Strategy
    TouchArcade Rating:Unrated
    Compatibility:HD Universal

    Is this just the Netflix version of touch without the iap?

  2. Yup. Looks like it. This game had so many IAPs and so much progression/leveling system. Ruined it for me.
  3. @Rocksaint yes I just tried it for 10 min while I could grab a few min. Definitely think it’s the iap filled touch one, but I think I’ll give it a go now since it’s Netflix and won’t have all the iap. Still has idle earning for gold though so it’ll still be one you come and go from rather than play for hours on end I imagine.
  4. Problem is not being free of all IAPs. Problem for these games is that they are designed to be F2P. And Netflix doesn’t fix that. So it just feels like a F2P game pulled into a sub model. That’s it.

    But yeah, no harm in giving it a go if you’ve already got Netflix.

  5. The screenshots make it look so pretty with the images on the AppStore but I think it looks pretty ugly and dated, worse than even the original games looked for my taste anyway.

  6. The only aesthetic in the series I have any love for is the first one. When I saw this thread's title, I thought it was a subscription version of that one and thought it was a shame I wouldn't play it for that reason. When I saw the art style, I was relieved.
    (⁠ ⁠ꈍ⁠ᴗ⁠ꈍ⁠)

Share This Page
